, my apologies on such short notice, but there's something I need your help with.
Please come to Velika Headquarters.

Seir

After enjoying the second Banquet, was summoned to Velika by Seir, to visit the Island of Dawn to return a pendant to Jovin.

However, Jovin was not the owner of the pendant.
Jovin requested to handle the Time Distortion that troubled the Island of Dawn, and in the meanwhile, he would search for the owner of the pendant.

agreed to do so, but Jovin failed to find the owner. As a result, had no other option but to take the pendant to Velika.

You're here!
I hope you enjoyed the banquet.

The issue I mentioned isn't that much of a fuss.

Did you possibly lose anything during the banquet?
A pendant, for instance."A pendant?"

We're trying to return all items that were left behind after the banquet, and this particular pendant caught my eye.

It's the same size of my palm, and covered in silver.
With it's luxurious looks, I assumed that this is no ordinary pendant.

My theory was that the owner of a Pendant like this must be very noble, or have a matchless strength."I see, but the pendant is not mine."

You say?
Hmm...I wonder who the owner is.

Would you take it and find out?

Maybe it belongs to someone you know."Got it."

Thank you.

Go to Meren. She'll give you the pendant.

You're here for the pendant, right?

Give me just a moment...

Should be right...

Here you are, one Silverblue Pendant.
Have you seen it before?"No, I haven't."

Really?

A pendant that even hasn't seen before...I wonder who it belongs to.

I've already checked with everyone on the banquet list."Maybe it's someone you haven't checked yet."

Someone I haven't checked yet? You were the only one left...well, and Jovin.

But I can't reach Jovin right now. He's on an urgent mission at the Island of Dawn.

Ah! As it turns out, Jovin has been asking for reinforcements. Would you go there and help him out? And take the pendant, to see if it belongs to him?"Will do."

Thank you.

{@linkcreature:13#8031#Jovin} is at the Arun Heights of the Southern Island of Dawn.

Here...use this Teleport Scroll. It will take you to the Tainted Gorge Outpost.

Please support Jovin on his mission, and of course find out if the pendant belongs to him.

What? A pendant?

I'm sorry you came all the way to ask, but it doesn't belong to me.

It's quite unique, though...
that pattern etched on the jewel...

Is that an eye? An eye turned upside down...

Someone should have noticed something so unique, don't you think?"Any ideas on how to find the owner?"

A high-class masterpiece like that must have been sold to someone.

I know a few merchants who handle such items. Maybe you could get some information from them.

I wish I could go with you, but I must finish my mission first."What's your mission?"

A few days ago, the Brutal Onyx Hydraths, Brutal Iron Giants, and the Brutal Naga Battlemasters became aggressive all of a sudden.

I suspect that the time distortions in the Tainted Gorge have something to do with it.

The monsters there are all affected."That sounds serious."

Indeed. In order to do study the phenomenon, we have to clear their systems of corrupted mana, using our Dimension Stabilizer.
But we'll first need to collect the corrupted mana using this Mana Charger.

We've tried many times, but the monsters are just too powerful."I think I can help with that."

Take the Mana Charger with you. the creatures most affected by the time distortions are {@linkcreature:13#7007#Brutal Naga Battlemasters}, {@linkcreature:13#7009#Brutal Onyx Hydraths}, and {@linkcreature:13#7008#Brutal Iron Giants}. If you can defeat one, the Mana Charger will automatically collect a samble.

Come back when it's fully charged.

Great job, !

Now we have to transfer the corrupted mana to the Dimension Stabilizer.

This work requires extreme caution, and a steady hand.

You might want to stake a few steps back..."Take your time."

Done!

Now, use the Dimension Stabilizer near a Time Distortionâ€”they look like floating rocks with strange symbols on them. You'll know one if you see it.

If my theory is correct, the distortions should disappear and the monsters will calm down.

I'll ask around about your pendant while you're gone.
You cannot operate the <font color='#0000FF'>Dimension Stabilizer</font> yet.

! Thanks to you, research in the Tainted Gorge is back on track.

It's a pity we couldn't figure out the cause of the time distortions, though."And the pendant?"

I've contacted everyone I know...merchants, jewelers, even castanic blacksmiths, but I couldn't find who it belongs to, nor who created it.

Sorry I couldn't be more helpful."Don't worry about it. Thanks."

I must go over this new data.

Thank you for all your help!

I hope you find the pendant's owner, and may Velik be with you!

It didn't belong to Jovin?

Tough situation here...we can't keep it forever.

Oh, Jovin sent a report on your Island of Dawn mission.

Nice work.What should I do with the pendant?"

Would you take care of it for a while?

If the owner doesn't show up, you might as well keep it for yourself.

, thank you for all you've done for the federation.

This is your reward.
